question: What is another name for the plant Sideritis scardica?
ideal_answer: Sideritis scardica is also known as ironwort or mountain tea.

snippets.text: Sideritis scardica Griseb. (ironwort, mountain tea), an endemic plant of the Balkan Peninsula, has been used in traditional medicine in the treatment of gastrointestinal complaints, inflammation, and rheumatic disorders.
